javascript_fundamentals.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Assessment
javascript_fundamentals.description: Test your core JavaScript programming skills

questions.title: Array Sum of Evens
questions.description: Write a function that takes an array of integers and returns the sum of all even numbers. Handle edge cases like empty arrays.
hints: Use the modulo operator (%) to check if a number is even
Consider using array methods like filter() and reduce()
Don't forget to handle edge cases

questions.title: String Word Reversal
questions.description: Create a function that reverses each word in a sentence while keeping the word order intact. For example: 'hello world' becomes 'olleh dlrow'.
hints: Split the sentence into words first

questions.title: Palindrome Finder
questions.description: Implement a function to find the longest palindromic substring in a given string. A palindrome reads the same forwards and backwards.
hints: Check both odd and even length palindromes
Keep track of the longest palindrome found so far

questions.title: Object Deep Clone
questions.description: Write a function that creates a deep copy of a JavaScript object, handling nested objects and arrays. Do not use JSON.parse/stringify.
hints: Consider using Array.isArray() to detect arrays
